issue.subject: SQL syntax error
issue.description:
*In com_easysdi_contact* administrator\components\com_easysdi_contact\models\users.php administrator\components\com_easysdi_contact\models\organisms.php At the very end of the method getListQuery(), remove the group by 'a.id' statement. It gives an incorrect SQL query. *In com_easysdi_catalog* administrator\components\com_easysdi_catalog\models\resourcestype.php In method getListQuery(), at line 115, quote name of the column 'view' (reserved keyword in SQLServer): 
// Select the required fields from the table.
        $query->select(
                $this->getState(
                        'list.select', 'a.id, a.alias, a.checked_out, a.checked_out_time, a.predefined, a.versioning, a.diffusion,' . $db->quoteName( 'a.view') .' , a.ordering, a.state, a.name'
                )
        );
